title: Industrial robots - worldwide sales 2004 to 2018
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Sales in thousand units, containing a total of 15 data points.
In general Sales in thousand units has rose over the Year.
The line rapidly increased by 101.67% from Year 2009 to 2010.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2016 and 2017.
The highest Sales in thousand units, of value 384.0 was reached at Year 2018
Minimum Sales in thousand units about 60.0 was reached at Year 2009
min_summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Sales in thousand units, containing a total of 15 data points.
Overall Sales in thousand units has increased over the Year.

Sales in thousand units is roughly constant from 2004 to 2008, slightly decreasing from 2008 to 2009, gradually increasing from 2009 to 2011, roughly constant from 2011 to 2013, slightly increasing from 2013 to 2017, and finally roughly constant from 2017 to 2018.

max_summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Sales in thousand units. In total the number of data points it has is 15.
Overall Sales in thousand units has increased over the Year.

Sales in thousand units is roughly constant from 2004 to 2008, slightly decreasing from 2008 to 2009, gradually increasing from 2009 to 2011, roughly constant from 2011 to 2013, slightly increasing from 2013 to 2017, and finally roughly constant from 2017 to 2018.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2016 and 2017.
The highest Sales in thousand units, of value 384.0 was reached at Year 2018
Minimum Sales in thousand units about 60.0 was reached at Year 2009
The line drastically increased by 2.0 times from Year 2009 to 2010.
